::Shadow Wing:;

She could tell by the sound of his voice that he wasn't pleased to 
hear from her.  She decided that he just needed to take time to work 
things out.  She opened her link for the last time to him.
"Never mind. Have fun and I'll see you when you get back. Just please 
be careful where ever you are."
She would have a little worry for him while he was away, but she knew 
he was a capable warrior and could take care of himself.  She still 
worried about him though.



----Original Message----
From:   <cyberwolf4@p...>
Date: Sun Jul 30, 2000 4:35pm
Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars


(Ok, 1 more post)Lunarpine heard Shadow Wing over his comm. 
Shadow Wing always had a bad sense of timing, here he was tracking 
Primus knows what and she practically gives away his location if 
anyone happened to be scanning for signals.

He opened his link, "Make it quick Wing I'm busy." It was a gruff 
answer but it got his point across. 

"I knew I should have deactivated my link" the wolf thought as he 
found a place to take cover, just in case any unfriendlies happened 
by.
